1.Description: Avoid the use of the root account

2.Description: Ensure multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for all IAM users that have a console password
2.failReason: No MFA on users with password.

3.Description: Ensure credentials unused for 90 days or greater are disabled

4.Description: Ensure access keys are rotated every 90 days or less
4.failReason: Key rotation >90 days or not used since rotation

5.Description: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one uppercase letter

6.Description: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one lowercase letter

7.Description: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one symbol

8.Description: Ensure IAM password policy requires at least one number
8.failReason: Password policy does not require at least one number

9.Description: Ensure IAM password policy requires minimum length of 14 or greater
9.failReason: Password policy does not require at least 14 characters

10.Description: Ensure IAM password policy prevents password reuse
10.failReason: Password policy does not prevent reusing last 24 passwords

11.Description: Ensure IAM password policy expires passwords within 90 days or less
11.failReason: Password policy does not expire passwords after 90 days or less

12.Description: Ensure no root account access key exists

13.Description: Ensure MFA is enabled for the root account

14.Description: Ensure hardware MFA is enabled for the root account
14.failReason: Root account not using hardware MFA

15.Description: Ensure security questions are registered in the AWS account, please verify manually
15.failReason: Control not implemented using API, please verify manually

16.Description: Ensure IAM policies are attached only to groups or roles

17.Description: Enable detailed billing, please verify manually
17.failReason: Control not implemented using API, please verify manually

18.Description: Ensure IAM Master and IAM Manager roles are active. Control under review/investigation
18.failReason: No IAM Master or IAM Manager role created

19.Description: Maintain current contact details, please verify manually
19.failReason: Control not implemented using API, please verify manually

20.Description: Ensure security contact information is registered, please verify manually
20.failReason: Control not implemented using API, please verify manually

21.Description: Ensure IAM instance roles are used for AWS resource access from instances, application code is not audited
21.failReason: Instance not assigned IAM role for EC2

22.Description: Ensure a support role has been created to manage incidents with AWS Support
22.failReason: No user, group or role assigned AWSSupportAccess

24.Description: Ensure IAM policies that allow full administrative privileges are not created

1.Description: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions
1.failReason: No enabled multi region trails found

2.Description: Ensure CloudTrail log file validation is enabled

3.Description: Ensure the S3 bucket CloudTrail logs to is not publicly accessible

4.Description: Ensure CloudTrail trails are integrated with CloudWatch Logs

5.Description: Ensure AWS Config is enabled in all regions
5.failReason: Config not enabled in all regions, not capturing all/global events or delivery channel errors

6.Description: Ensure S3 bucket access logging is enabled on the CloudTrail S3 bucket

7.Description: Ensure CloudTrail logs are encrypted at rest using KMS CMKs

8.Description: Ensure rotation for customer created CMKs is enabled

1.Description: Ensure log metric filter unauthorized api calls
1.failReason: Incorrect log metric alerts for unauthorized_api_calls

2.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for Management Console sign-in without MFA
2.failReason: Incorrect log metric alerts for management console signin without MFA

3.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for root usage
3.failReason: Incorrect log metric alerts for root usage

4.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for IAM changes
4.failReason: Incorrect log metric alerts for IAM policy changes

5.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for CloudTrail configuration changes
5.failReason: Incorrect log metric alerts for CloudTrail configuration changes

6.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for console auth failures
6.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for console auth failures

7.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for disabling or scheduling deletion of KMS CMK
7.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for disabling or scheduling deletion of KMS CMK

8.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for S3 bucket policy changes
8.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for S3 bucket policy changes

9.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for for AWS Config configuration changes
9.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for for AWS Config configuration changes

10.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for security group changes
10.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for security group changes

11.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to Network Access Control Lists (NACL)
11.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to Network Access Control Lists (NACL)

12.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to network gateways
12.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for changes to network gateways

13.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for route table changes
13.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for route table changes

14.Description: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for VPC changes
14.failReason: Ensure a log metric filter and alarm exist for VPC changes

15.Description: Ensure appropriate subscribers to each SNS topic, please verify manually
15.failReason: Control not implemented using API, please verify manually

1.Description: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22
1.failReason: Found Security Group with port 22 open to the world (0.0.0.0/0)

2.Description: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389
2.failReason: Found Security Group with port 3389 open to the world (0.0.0.0/0)

3.Description: Ensure VPC flow logging is enabled in all VPCs
3.failReason: VPC without active VPC Flow Logs found

4.Description: Ensure the default security group of every VPC restricts all traffic
4.failReason: Default security groups with ingress or egress rules discovered

5.Description: Ensure routing tables for VPC peering are least access
